sentences.english: After delivering you bowl of jellied bean curd to finish eating, laughed. March Eighth joyful

sentences.english: Only no. 12 little piggy laughingly snoozed in his leather jacket.

definition: grinning from ear to ear (idiom)/beaming with happiness
brows raised in delight, eyes laughing (idiom); beaming with joy/all smiles
smile spread across the face (idiom); beaming with pleasure/all smiles/joy written across one's face
to giggle/to laugh foolishly/to smirk/to simper
happy and excited (idiom)/in high spirits/in great delight
to laugh heartily/to burst into loud laughter
